You will be able to book onto courses **four weeks in advance**, via online booking forms on this page.

We'll send updates to our [training alerts mailing list](mailing-list.qmd) when new booking forms are available.
Make sure you're signed up, if you'd like to get the announcements!

For more information or if you have any questions, please [contact us](contact.qmd).

**We are currently planning our teaching schedule for this term, keep an eye on the mailing list for updates!**
